title: 13 RP?
body:
Hey Riot,

Could you please give me 13rp so that I can get a Yasuo Chroma for High Noon Yasuo. I think the Chromas fro that skin look sick and would be awesome if I had one.

Thanks!

replies.body: Maybe we can work something out!  Hit us up on [Twitter](https://twitter.com/RiotSupport) or a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).  We'll reply back as soon as we can!
